input.sentences: [male] and his friends spent the day in country .
[male] found a headstone with his name on it .
the ocean was calm and peaceful
output.sentences: Matt didn't realize that his road trip with friends would end up being a genealogical adventure.
Their first stop, Arlington National Cemetery, was humbling to say the least.
Especially when Matt realized his great-grandfather was buried there.
After being adopted as a young child, Matt never thought he'd learn much about his real family.
He now realized why the eastern coast felt so much like home.
